docs.lead_paragraph: "ALBANY, April 18 Democratic and Republican legislators proposed separate bills today to control the distribution of LSD and other hallucinogenic drugs.

headline.main: LEGISLATURE GETS BILLS TO CURB LSD; Both Parties Call for More Severe Penalties for Use

docs.abstract: Assemblyman Travia and Sen Lent bills would make sale or distribution of LSD or similar drugs in NYS a felony punishable by 7-20-yr jail term; NJ Assembly passes legis proposed by Narcotic Drug Study Comm to curb mfr, sale and use of goofballs, pep pills and hallucinatory drugs
docs.snippet: "ALBANY, April 18 Democratic and Republican legislators proposed separate bills today to control the distribution of LSD and other hallucinogenic drugs.

byline.original: By RICHARD L. MADDEN Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC CITY, April 14 --Aspirin seems to have-anxiety relieving effects in addition to its pain killing qualities, a scientist reported here today.

headline.main: ASPIRIN REPORTED TO EASE ANXIETIES; Scientists Say Pain Killers Also Affect Brain Waves as Mild Tranquilizers Do ALCOHOL ROLE SIMILAR Other Common Drugs Used Against Pain Lack Twofold Reaction, Tests Indicate

docs.abstract: NJ Neuropsychiatric Inst tests show aspirin seems to have anxiety relieving effect; rept aspirin affects brain waves as minor tranquilizing drugs do
docs.snippet: ATLANTIC CITY, April 14 --Aspirin seems to have-anxiety relieving effects in addition to its pain killing qualities, a scientist reported here today.
